DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the change in Hepatitis C Virus RNA during dosing with daclatasvir and during the follow-up period in subjects with chronic hepatitis C infection
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study of Daclatasvir (BMS-790052) in Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 Infected Subjects
DOC.criteria: Chronically infected with Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) genotype 1 Treatment naive or treatment nonresponders or treatment intolerant; and not coinfected with HIV or Hepatitis B Virus HCV RNA viral load of ≥10*5 IU/mL BMI 18 to 35kg/m² Any significant acute or chronic medical illness which is not stable or is not controlled with medication and not consistent with Hepatitis C Virus infection HIV and/or HBV positive Major surgery within 4 weeks of study drug administration and any gastrointestinal surgery that could impact the absorption of study drug WOCBP will be enrolled as inpatient for 16 days
